# Module: tf.contrib.keras.models



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/keras/api/keras/models/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.3/tensorflow/contrib/keras/api/keras/models/__init__.py).

Keras models API.

## Classes

[`class Model`](../../../tf/contrib/keras/models/Model): The `Model` class adds training & evaluation routines to a `Container`.

[`class Sequential`](../../../tf/contrib/keras/models/Sequential): Linear stack of layers.

## Functions

[`load_model(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/keras/models/load_model): Loads a model saved via `save_model`.

[`model_from_config(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/keras/models/model_from_config): Instantiates a Keras model from its config.

[`model_from_json(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/keras/models/model_from_json): Parses a JSON model configuration file and returns a model instance.

[`model_from_yaml(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/keras/models/model_from_yaml): Parses a yaml model configuration file and returns a model instance.

[`save_model(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/keras/models/save_model): Save a model to a HDF5 file.
